casebody.data:
John AZZI and Harry Azzi, an Infant under Fourteen Years of Age, by John Azzi, as His Guardian ad Litem, Plaintiffs-Appellees, v. BROOKLYN BUS CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellant. No. 128. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 12, 1938. George D. Yeomans, of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Ralph E. Hemstreet, of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. Hall, Cunningham, Jackson & Haywood, of New York City (Francis G. Hoyt, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
